question:
The Indian PM has been appointed as the chief guest of this year’s Eastern Economic Forum that is going to be held in Vladivostok, Russia. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. Eastern Economic Forum is an international forum that was established for the purpose of investment in the Russian Far East.
  2. Trans-Serbian Railway connects Serbia with the Russian Far East.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: Eastern Economic Forum was established in the year 2015 as per the decree of the Russian President Vladimir Putin. It serves as a platform for discussion on issues of global economy, measures for industrial development and technological innovations and also the regional integration. This forum includes talks with countries from Asia-Pacific region, ASEAN countries, etc.  Statement 2 is incorrect: Trans-Serbian Railway is a railway network that connects Moscow, Russia’s capital with the Russian Far East. It is the longest railway line in the world. It was built in 1916. Now its branches connect China, Mongolia and North Korea. This railway network connected Moscow with Vladivostok since 1916.
